title: Analysis of University Faculty Technology Utilization Levels and Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A language education course conducted in a smartphone-centric constrained technological environment, emphasizing practical skill integration tailored to participants' professional backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the current status of technology use among university professors based on survey data.
Propose at least three strategies for transitioning from teacher-centered activities to learner-engaged activities
Design an ICT-integrated lesson plan applicable in limited-technology environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
